name: Tessellator - Playtest Version
description:
PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY WARNING! 

This is the playtest version for the game Tessellator, which I am making for IGB100. 

I'd appreciate if you had a play of it and then filled out the playtest report below! 

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NGNK7P3

 Also, this game is best played when downloaded, but can be played in the browser if you'd prefer.

Thanks for playing, Tex "I made this game" Barnes
